creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: spherical form with gimbals in center arranged to keep central cup upright; decorated with openwork design of butterfiles in scrolling flowers and foliage
markings: dealer\'s stickers, on interior of cover
text: This delicate silvered-bronze sphere holds burning incense, which adds fragrance during ritual ceremonies. The interior has a mechanism that acts like a gyroscope and keeps the incense pot inside level and upright as the censor is swung about during ceremonies. The decoration consists of butterflies and chrysanthemums within a tendril pattern.
title: Censer
